apps.title: Beeline Reader
apps.des: Beeline uses an amazing  eye-guiding color gradient — to pull your eyes through long blocks of text. This helps you read more effectively and maintain your focus better.

apps.title: Toucan - Language Learning
apps.des: Learn a new language just by browsing the internet.

apps.title: OpenDyslexic font
apps.des: Format pages using the OpenDyslexic font and low contrast help

apps.title: EduChange.com
apps.des: We pioneered Open Learning Architecture™ to reinvent science class for ages 13-20. Global issues & PBL power 36+ modules & competency-based assessment. 4 implementation models deliver coherent, rigorous learning for real-world STEM.

apps.title: Lexend Deca
apps.des: These changes led to the development of seven specially-designed fonts, which create an immediate improvement in reading performance.This is where Lexend was formed.
